Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BottomPanel  
    Camera
    Since the worlds are much larger than the window the game renders at any given time, a camera is needed to follow the player around to display a limited section of the world.
    DrawableEntity
    Wrapper class used to graphically represent entities within the game.
    DrawableTile
    Wrapper class used to graphically represent tiles within the visible world and to draw them.
    DrawableWorld
    Class used to graphically represent the current world from the model.
    InventoryPanel  
    MainMenu  
    PlayerInventoryTable
    Class used to represent the player's inventory in table form.
    PlayerNameDocumentFilter
    Simple document filter implemented to limit user input in the "Player Name" text field to a fixed amount of word-only characters.
    Renderer
    Class used to render the visible world onto the game canvas.
    SkillsTable  
    TexturesLoader
    Utility class used to hold all the textures that can be drawn in the game.
    View
    Class used to hold all GUI-related containers.
